forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening. Fog developing late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early. Areas of fog developing after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then partly cloudy and windy later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning followed by partly cloudy skies and gusty winds during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 8C. N winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 47F. N winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low around 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
